events.role_description: Studied economics with classmates including Tyler Cowen, Alan Krueger, Steven Kaplan, and Nouriel Roubini. Attended courses with Andreu Mas-Colell, Lawrence Summers, Kala Krishna, Oliver Hart, and Susan Collins. Briefly served as a research assistant to Jeffrey Sachs. Dissertation research, supervised by Eric Maskin, was primarily theoretical and examined the economics of information.
Completed degree in 1983. Was arrested, imprisoned, and beaten at Tihar Jail in response to a protest.
